Desc.entry: A community organisation targeting anyone living in the Darnall ward, working to engage individuals in a range of activities promoting health and wellbeing. Offers a range of activities suitable for everyone including health walks, community gym, swimming, tai chi, yoga and aerobics, and courses. Runs Active Friends buddying scheme which provides people aged over 50 years with the support of a volunteer to help them become more active, and Social Prescribing signposting scheme that can help make changes in your life by helping people start new activities, become a volunteer or start a new course. Also offers a range of free and confidential stop smoking support, free outreach play sessions for 8-13 year olds. Has strong links with local health practices and NHS Sheffield. Company limited by guarantee no. 04027680.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Activities take place at a variety of times and venues throughout Darnall
